title: "HARDSTUCK IN PLAT 4 THO??????????" - Akali is SO HOT
body:
http://i.imgur.com/evXrc34.png/img

That feel when you win every game in 1 day going from Plat 4 0LP to promos and the game let's you skip a division as well

http://24.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lywnted14u1r0l1kdo1_500.gif

Also that feel when you casually meet a GD'er when your in your 2nd promo game solo queuing

https://i.giphy.com/media/3o7qEaEoG48VOzT4He/giphy.gif
